text: chtoby vy prosili proshcheniya u vashego Gospoda, a potom raskayalis' pred Nim, chtoby On nadelil vas dobrym dostoyaniyem do opredelennogo sroka i daroval kazhdomu zasluzhivayushchemu ot milosti Svoyey. Yesli zhe vy otklonites' [ot puti Allakha], to ya opasayus', [chto vas postignet] nakazaniye v Velikiy den'
